column1: Oiolossë was one of the names of Taniquetil.
Oiolossë (also spelled Oiolosse) is Quenya and means "Ever-snow-white"
column4: or "Everlasting snow". The name seems to consist of oio "ever" (cf. root OY)

column2: Oiolossë is referred to as Sinsnáw

column1: The Sindarin equivalent of Oiolossë was Amon Uilos.
